content:
On yesterday's SDC call, we looked at both the Questionnaire and QuestionnaireResponse resources and discussed which elements we might not want to be normative. We saw nothing in QuestionnaireResponse, but had discussions about 3 elements on Questionnaire:

  • useContext (not normative in other conformance resources)
  • type (see discussion here)
  • enableWhen (see discussion here)
We need to decide what we're proposing for normative by Mar. 30
